A rock that can be created when an [[Classes:FireDemon|afrit]] unrolls from its protective ball. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR FireDemonRock3 : {{Class|FireDemonRock1}} { States { Spawn: FDMN U 4 Loop Death: FDMN U 5 [[A_SmBounce]] XDeath: FDMN U 200 Stop } }
